titleStmt.title: The historie of Leonard Aretine concerning the warres betwene the Imperialles and the Gothes for the possession of Italy, a worke very pleasant and profitable. Translated out of Latin into Englishe by Arthur Goldyng.
De bello Italico adversus Gotthos. English
titleStmt.author: Bruni, Leonardo, 1369-1444.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Rouland Hall, for George Bucke,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: De bello Italico adversus Gotthos.
Running title reads: Of the warre of the Gothes in Italy.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
